---
title: "Exploring biodiversity files"
output: html_document
---

This script explores the raw biodiversity shapefiles from IUCN and birds of the world stored on the rdsi storage.

Libraries
```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(sf)
library(dtplyr)
library(raster)

source(here("src/directories.R"))


```

Look at birds
```{r}

birds_filepath <- st_read(file.path(iucn_dir, "spp_shapefiles/BOTW/BOTW.gdb"))




```
